page.shortlink: api sql namespace table info class update statistics function
page.description: Gather statistical information about the actual table.

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

page.discussion: The UpdateStatistics() method gathers information on the table for the specified connection. A successful call to UpdateStatistics()will set the LastKnownRowCount property and the MaximumActualLength (for character and binary columns) property for each DataTypeInfo(Column).
